price: 125. Ma waxaad baridaan Bacal13 oo ka tagtaan Kan u wanaagsan abuurayaasha.
footnotes: 13. Bacal Waa magaca sanam weyn ay caabudi jireen dadkii Phenisia, oo ay u heysteen inuu Rabbigood yahay.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
